title: Complete Travel Guide to Hanoi
description: Discover the best of Hanoi with our comprehensive travel guide covering attractions, food, culture, and practical tips.
content:
Welcome to Hanoi

Hanoi is one of Vietnam's most captivating destinations. This guide will help you make the most of your visit.

Top Attractions

Explore the best sights and experiences Hanoi has to offer.

attractions.name: Historic Hanoi Center
attractions.description: The heart of Hanoi with beautiful architecture

tips.title: Best Time to Visit
tips.content: Visit during dry season for best weather

tips.title: Getting Around
tips.content: Taxis and ride-sharing apps are readily available
